messages.subject: Re:  Introduction from Vic
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Vic, I like the way you think! I believe also that even though we have different religious and political views, respect for each other is most important. I
messages.messageBody:
Hi Vic,

I like the way you think!

I believe also that even though we have different religious and political
views, respect for each other is most important.

I believe that what unites us is this:  We are all mom's that are
homeschooling becuase we believe it is the best thing for our child/children.
 So whether as a mom we breast fed or not, (i didn't) or we immunize or not
(i did) or we are Christian or Pagan, (christian) homeschool all or one,
(one, right now) we are united by that universal "mom" thread of love.

I wish you luck and welcome you to the loop!

Dawn
mom to ds8, ds5, dd3
